title: Fluid Mechanics
description: Elementary mechanics of fluids with emphasis on hydrostatics, control volume analysis of flowing fluids using kinematics, continuity, energy, and momentum principles; similitude, pipe flow.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CEE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 2202 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
